name: Sandun Weerakkody
bio: Dharshanapriya Sandun Weerakkody (born 3 September 1993) is a professional Sri Lankan cricketer, plays for One Day Internationals for Sri Lanka. Weerakkody is a past pupil of Dharmaraja College, Kandy.[1] A left-handed batsman and a wicketkeeper, he plays first-class cricket for Nondescripts Cricket Club.[1]
